attributes.action: Make the banks' bail-out a people's bail-out!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For the approximately GBP80m given to Northern Rock, Bradford and Bingley, RBS, HBOS and Lloyd's TSB offer shares (in these banks) worth GBP2,000 each to every adult (@40m adults). This will:
(i) increase accountability because people would be better at getting value than a civil servant or two;
(ii) give the average Britisher wealth when he really needs help (and thus increase consumption in the economy); and
(iii) be a good test if public services could better be owned in shares by local consumers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
